sentences.en: ...the monument was Stone Age or Neolithic.
sentences.cn: ...该纪念碑是属于石器时代或新石器时代的。

sentences.en: Be traced back thousands of years ago the Neolithic Age, human beings evolved on land.
sentences.cn: 追溯到几千年前的新石器时代, 人类就在这块土地上繁衍生息.

sentences.en: By 10,000 BC, most of mankind was at the Neolithic level.
sentences.cn: 到公元前10000年, 大部分人类已经处于新石器时代的水平.

sentences.en: Cattle were first domesticated in Neolithic times.
sentences.cn: 新石器时代有人开始驯养牛.

sentences.en: During Neolithic Period, people have already begun breeding silkworm and producing silk.
sentences.cn: 新石器时代, 蚕的养殖和丝绸的生产,就已经开始了.

sentences.en: From Neolithic time to anddynasty, a unique tradition of jade culture had been made.
sentences.cn: 从新石器时代到明清, 形成了深厚的传统,在世界上独树一帜.

sentences.en: Hejian a long history of human habitation there from the Neolithic Age.
sentences.cn: 河间历史悠久,从新石器时代晚期就有人类居住.

sentences.en: Humans lived on Green Island early as years ago at the end of the Neolithic Era.
sentences.cn: 早自三千年前之新石器时代末期,就已经有人类在绿岛定居.

sentences.en: Jade carving figure head, Neolithic Age, Height: 3.7 cm.
sentences.cn: 玉雕人头像, 新石器时代, 高 3.7 厘米.

sentences.en: Laoting County has a long history, asas the late Neolithic period some people thriving here.
sentences.cn: 乐亭县历史悠久, 早在新石器时代晚期就有人在这里繁衍生息.

sentences.en: Neolithic people have taken one more small step toward increasing their familiarity with the heavens.
sentences.cn: 新石器时代的人们向着了解天体方面又迈出了一小步.

sentences.en: Shanxi has an extremely large number of excavated tombs and neolithic sites.
sentences.cn: 山西发掘出不计其数的坟墓和新石器遗址.

sentences.en: The archaeologists have dug up some interesting Neolithic remains.
sentences.cn: 考古学家挖掘出一些有趣的新石器时代的古物.

sentences.en: The lion ( much bigger than the existing form ) stayed on in southern Germany till Neolithic period.
sentences.cn: 直到新石器时代,狮子 ( 比现在的大得多 ) 还在德国南部逗留.

sentences.en: The Neolithic Age ( New Stone Age ) was beginning.
sentences.cn: 新石器 时代正在开始.

sentences.en: Yuhang ancestors, as early as the Neolithic period, in Liangzhu, pingyao formation of village area.
sentences.cn: 余杭先民, 早在新石器时期, 于良渚 、 瓶窑一带形成聚落.

trans.tran_en: Neolithic is used to describe things relating to the period when people had started farming but still used stone for making weapons and tools
